name: Goober's in the Mix
description:
Metroidvania style game featuring Goober the goblin. This is a prototype and first of a coming series of games featuring Goober and similar characters in different and combined adventures.

Controls:
left and right arrows or S/F keys to move left and right
up and down to change potion recipe
O to jump / select
X to charge/throw potions

O button is mapped to Z or C on most keyboards
X button is mapped to X or V on most keyboards

Game by Ryan Ford

Music By Cody Loyd
